title: A Big-Picture Look at HBO, Plus ‘Crashing’ and ‘Pen15’ | The Watch
description:
What does the future of HBO look like after the merger between AT&T and Time Warner (6:47)? Plus a midseason review of ‘Crashing’ (35:40) and the teen television renaissance that continues with ‘Pen15’ (42:30).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
